name: BEEHIVE RAID
description:
Beehive Raid is a 2D, SHMUP project where you must protect your beehive from invading wasps! 

Controls:

This game is designed for the controller.

It is playable with the keyboard but it will be more harder. 

L2 -- Dash

R2 -- Spin Attack

Left Joystick -- Move

Right Joystick -- Rotate

X Button -- Powerup Ability

KEYBOARD: 

Left Shift -- Dash

Left Alt -- Spin Attack

W and S Key -- Move 

Left and Right Arrows -- Rotate

Space -- Powerup Ability

The beehive signifies your health in the game, so protect it by charging into enemy wasps. 

The ball of honey is a pickup and if you obtain 6 of them you can send out armies of bees. 

The flower is a pickup that you can collect when your beehive health gets low enough.
